thumb.title: [TAS] [3dSen] NES 悪魔城ドラキュラ by Challenger in 10:18.91
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n9Pc9HQDWMQ3DSenを使ってるみたいです。以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/4342MThe video was recorded using Bizhawk emulation core embeded in 3dSen Maker.3DSen Maker: https://geod.itch.io/3dsen-maker 3DSen PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1147940/3dSen_PC/3DSen VR: https://store.steampowered.com/app/954280/3dSen_VR/Homepage: http://www.geodstudio.net/元の動画https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BhIgB-VZRKQニコニコhttps://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm37869420
thumb.last_res_body: かなり風が強いね... 誰がソニアだって？ イケメンガチファ... なんかブサイクｗ えらく幅広の開き... 転載元の動画自体... ちょｗｗｗよくや... ﾑｯ（石像とキスし...
